text: Encore is the fifth studio album by American rapper Eminem. Encore was released on November 12, 2004 and was produced by Dr. Dre, Eminem, Luis Resto, Mike Elizondo and Mark Batson. The album was given 3 out of 5 stars by Allmusic. It was nominated for Best Rap Album, Best Rap Performance by a Duo or Group for the song "Encore" and Best Rap Solo Performance for "Mockingbird" at the 48th Grammy Awards. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2004 albums Category:Eminem albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:Comedy hip hop albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Aftermath Entertainment albums Category:Interscope Records albums Category:Shady Records albums
title: Encore (album)
